title: Celtics Chaos Emergency Pod With Bill Simmons, Jackie MacMullan, and Kevin O’Connor
description:
Russillo is joined by Bill Simmons, Jackie MacMullan, and Kevin O’Connor to discuss news on the heels of a first-round playoff exit: Celtics President of Basketball Ops Danny Ainge is retiring and Brad Stevens will be replacing him. They discuss off-season player movement, Celtics head coaching candidates, what could be next for Ainge, and more.

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guests: Bill Simmons, Jackie MacMullan, and Kevin O'Connor
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
